data.title: SPECTRUM UNLIMITED LLC
data.text:
Birthday Report for December 18th, 1980

BirthStone Turquoise BirthSign Sagittarius

Events of the Month for Christina Aguilera

When Christina Aguilera entered the world, these stories made the front page of the nation's newspapers: On the 21st, the prime interest rate zooms to 21.5 percent, the highest rate on record. Top movies for the year inclMovie News for the year Christina Aguilera was born.aging Bull" with Robert De Niro and "Coal Miner's Daughter" with Sissy Spacek. President Jimmy Carter signs into law on the19th a bill that will preserve huge tracts of wilderness in Alaska. Ford Motor Company announces a record loss of 5 million for the quarter.

Entertainment News for the year Christina Aguilera was born

Audiences were applauding these developments in the entertainment industry when Christina Aguilera was an infant. This is the year that The Empire Strikes Back, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford and Carrie Fisher, this sequel to Star Wars is a box office hit. The hits coming across the radio this year include Could I Have This Dance, Another One Bites the Dust by Queen and Let My Love Open the Door.

Popular Music when Christina Aguilera was born.

When Christina Aguilera was rocking in a cradle, these songs were topping the music charts: Back in 1980, the popular songs were: Call Me performed by Blondie; Coming Up performed by Paul McCartney & Wings; Funkytown sung by Lipps, Inc.; as well as Magic by Olivia Newton-John. Also topping the musical charts: Rock with You by Michael Jackson; Sailing by Christopher Cross; Starting Over by John Lennon; and the ever popular Upside Down by Diana Ross.

Movie news for the year Christina Aguilera was born.

While Christina Aguilera was discovering how to stand up, The Academy gave a standing ovation to these movies and actors: 'Ordinary People'- Directed by Robert Redford won the Best Movie Academy Award in 1980. Also this year, the Academy Award for Best Actor went to Robert De Niro for his role in 'Raging Bull' and the Best Actress Award went to Sissy Spacek for her role in 'Coal Miner's Daughter'.
